string-array.item: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.\n -Nelson Mandela
The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.\n -Herbert Spencer
Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.\n - John Dewey
The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.\n -Aristotle
Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.\n -George Washington Carver
The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.\n -Sydney J. Harris\
The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.\n -Malcolm Forbes
